item.title: Rabin-Karp Algorithm
item.description: Used to find a substring of a string, i.e. finding nan in banana. General idea: Calculate the hash value for nan, hash1 = n * 26**2 + a * 26 + n. NOTE: Need to mod the hash value with a large prime number, then the hash value won’t go too large. From the beginning of string banana, calculate the hash value for 3 chars, ban, hash2 = b * 26**2 + a * 26 + n.
